flawed_nl_solution:

He read 200 pages from the 1000 page book because 1000 x (1/5) = <<1000*(1/5)=200>>200
He has read 596 pages in total.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 600, not 596. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
